title: Any way to get 1rp?
body: Im 1rp away from being able to buy a hextech key, my question is, is there any way to get 1rp? i heard about submitting a ticket to rito or something. but im not sure.

replies.body: I think you have to submit an artwork of something from League of Legends or something.
so i could "draw" jax or someone and submit, and boom, free 1rp? ;P
I could be wrong, but people have done it before. Hopefully it does!
okay i so submitted my drawing to riot support and they gave me 10rp for it lmao. thats so great <3
lol nice drawing of gragas m8
I'm sure riot support will give you 1rp if you ask them [unless you've been banned or something]; i got unchained alistar from it after not getting a code
